description: A light and fluffy flan seasoned with chile, cinnamon and anise, and topped with a filigree of pepita praline (just hulled pumpkinseeds mixed with caramel) This is dinner party pudding at its zenith.
title: Dark Chocolate Flan With Pumpkinseed Praline
title_page: Dark Chocolate Flan With Pumpkinseed Praline Recipe - NYT Cooking
